TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 帮助读取配置文件的 节，并帮助创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Assists in reading in the section of a configuration file and creating an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已``弃用类和相应的配置节。The class and the corresponding `` configuration section have been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 用于管理浏览器功能的首选方法是通过为类使用而编译的浏览器定义文件。The preferred method for managing browser capabilities is through browser definition files that are compiled for use by the class. 这两种配置方法的目标是生成可 从类的属性访问的类的实例。The goal of both configuration methodologies is to generate an instance of the class that can be accessed from the property of the class. 使用浏览器定义文件来存储浏览器功能, 可以优于替代方法。Using the browser definition files to store browser capabilities affords advantages over the alternative. 它提高了性能, 因为浏览器定义信息是从 XML 配置文件分析的, 并预先编译到了类中。It offers improved performance because the browser definition information is parsed from the XML configuration file and compiled into a class ahead of time. 浏览器定义文件也更易于维护:The browser definition files are also easier to maintain: - 定义是分层的, 因此不依赖正则表达式来确定浏览器的功能。The definitions are hierarchical, and thus rely less on regular expressions to determine the browser capabilities. - 定义可以组织到多个文件中, 使其更易于管理。The definitions can be organized in multiple files, making them easier to manage. - 定义可以在任何级别上定义, 无论是在 Machine.config 级别还是在特定应用程序级别。The definitions can be defined at any level, either at the Machine.config level or a specific application level. 这样就无需复制整个定义集, 目的是为了覆盖特定浏览器的功能。This eliminates the need to copy the entire set of definitions for the purpose of overriding the capabilities for a specific browser.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件和浏览器功能

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls and Browser Capabilities

summary.span: 创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

returns.span: 包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类从``配置节中派生其浏览器定义数据。This class derives its browser definition data from the `` configuration section. 此部分在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已弃用。This section is deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
